q11.question: What does Radha do with Ashok ?
q11.recall: Radha confronts Ashok and he tests himself again.
q11.vectordb: Radha and Ashok engage in various tests and acts of intimacy. Radha and Sita also develop a romantic relationship and engage in a sexual encounter. Ashok catches Radha and Sita in the act and becomes upset. Radha decides to leave Ashok, and Sita also leaves. Ashok tries to test himself again with Radha but she refuses.
